scripts.build-prod: mkdir -p prod && cp src/index.html prod/ && rm -rf dist && spago bundle-app --to prod/index.js && parcel build prod/index.html
scripts.bundle: spago bundle-app --main Main --to dist/app.js && parcel build assets/index.html

name: purescript
description: ### Quick Start ```sh git clone https://github.com/purescript-halogen/purescript-halogen-template.git halogen-project cd halogen-project npm install npm run build npm run serve ```
